Html: Is there a way to read the cell formula instead of the cell value?
Not currently. You could probably get at the formula if you dig into the library, but there is a bit of a learning curve figuring out the excel format.

Thanks for the reply - it would be a handy feature to have.

In my case I can infer the formula by comparing the source and destination values to get the multiplier value (e.g. 125%).
